Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city administrative code, in relation to requiring that the roofs of city-owned buildings be partially covered in source control measures
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that the roofs of city-owned buildings be partially covered in source control measures.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to requiring that the roofs of certain buildings be partially covered in green roof or solar photovoltaic electricity generating systems
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Roofs of certain buildings be partially covered in green roof or solar photovoltaic electricity generating systems.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending J-51 benefits to owners of multiple dwellings for sustainable roofing zones
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending J-51 benefits to owners of multiple dwellings for sustainable roofing zones.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting information regarding green roofs on the website of the department of buildings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Posting information regarding green roofs on the website of the office of alternative energy.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to requiring that the roofs of certain buildings be covered in green roofs or solar photovoltaic electricity generating systems
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that the roofs of certain buildings be covered in green roofs or solar photovoltaic electricity generating systems.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation that would increase the real property tax abatement for the installation of a green roof to $15 per square foot
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increase the real property tax abatement for the installation of a green roof to $15 per square foot.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.MatterName: Studying the feasibility of implementing solar-ready measures for commercial buildings.
